attributes.action: Make St George's Day a public holiday. A national UK day would be in addition to a St George's Day, we wish to celebrate being English in a similiar manner to the Irish.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We would like to celebrate St. George's Day as a bank holiday in the same manner the Irish celebrate St Patrick's Day. 
A UK/British day does not cover what we are asking for. 
We are asking for no more than the Northern Irish receive in their bank holiday celebrations for their patron saint.
We are not requesting an additional holiday, we will be happy to accept another bank holiday being lost in its place.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to make St George's Day a public holiday. A national UK day would be in addition to a St George's Day, we wish to celebrate being English in a similiar manner to the Irish.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=dayforengland


Her Majesty's Government
